alert.note: Alert for Mobile Inland; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:29AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mobile, southwestern Washington, eastern Perry, southern Wayne and Greene Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 129 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near McLain to 3 miles northeast of Leakesville to 7 miles west of Citronelle to Chickasaw. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saraland, Satsuma, Citronelle, Creola, Chatom, Leakesville, Chunchula, Clara, Gulfcrest, Deer Park, Axis, Tibbie, Beaumont, Calvert, Mount Vernon, McLain, State Line, Buckatunna, Fruitdale and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
